LanguageData.CannotLandOnSameTile: Cannot land on the same tile
LanguageData.GravEngineNotInspected: Send a colonist to inspect this.
LanguageData.RequiresSignalJammer: Heavy weapons systems: Requires signal jammer to approach
LanguageData.GravshipInNoBuildArea: Can't place close to the map edge
LanguageData.GravshipMustBeConnectedToLand: Must be connected to solid ground
LanguageData.GravshipOutcomeChanceLetterExtra: Based on the gravship's launch, there was a {0_percentage} chance of a negative outcome.
LanguageData.PilotConsoleInaccessible: Pilot console is not accessible from gravship
LanguageData.WarningThrusterInside: Warning: {0} will be blocked due to being indoors.
LanguageData.MineralRichDescription: This area has more {MINERAL_label} deposits than normal.
LanguageData.CaveEntranceLetterText: The gravcore energy signature is coming from a nearby cave network. The entrance is guarded by insect hives.\n\nExplore the cave network to find the gravcore.
LanguageData.InsectAmbushLetterText: Insects are tunneling up from underneath the ground. Be prepared!
LanguageData.LetterInsectQueenWarning: Behind a nearby wall, {PAWN_nameDef} can hear muffled pulsations accompanied by a low chittering noise. Something massive lies behind the wall.
LanguageData.ShowVacuumOverlayToggleButton: Toggle vacuum overlay. This displays which areas have vacuum and identifies leaks.\n\nWithout the right equipment, exposure to vacuum can be deadly.
LanguageData.FishingSpotOverTargetResourceCount: stored fish exceed fishing zone settings
LanguageData.SwapOutfitDesc: Order a colonist to wear all apparel on the stand. The colonist will place any unequipped clothing back on the stand.
LanguageData.EjectApparelTooltip: Remove this from the outfit stand.
LanguageData.LetterAncientGravEngineDiscovered: You've discovered an ancient grav engine. Destroy it to obtain a gravcore.
LanguageData.ShowExpandingLandmarksToggleButton: Toggle displaying expanding icons for landmarks.
LanguageData.CerebrexCoreDialog: Before {PAWN_nameDef} stands the cerebrex core - a massive brain-like neural mesh that commands mechanoids across the planet.\n\nWith its stabilizers destroyed, {PAWN_nameDef} can now access it directly... but what should {PAWN_pronoun} do with that power?
LanguageData.OdysseyDestroyedCredits:
{PAWN_nameDef} begins to tear apart the hair-thin cerebral mesh inside the cerebrex core. The mesh twists and groans, as if alive. Electricity arcs among the latticework frame - then in an instant, all goes dark and lifeless.

The mechanoid whirring stops. Here, and all across the planet, mechanoids begin to permanently deactivate, no longer under the control of the mechhive.

The mechanoid threat is over. But your story continues...
LanguageData.OdysseyScavengedCredits:
{PAWN_nameDef} begins working to free a processing node buried within the core. The latticework frame convulses as if in agony. As {PAWN_nameDef} pulls the node free, the mesh begins to mend, repairing the damage. The core rebuilds its defences and closes.

Turning the node over, {PAWN_nameDef} recoils as it sparks to life, pulsing in time with the core. In {PAWN_possessive} hand, {PAWN_nameDef} holds a weapon of untold power.

The story continues...
LanguageData.ConfirmLoseShuttle: Reforming a caravan will abandon your shuttle. Are you sure you want to continue?\n\nTo leave with your shuttle, select the shuttle, then select 'launch'.
LanguageData.AnimalAttackTargetDesc: Command this animal to attack a specific target that its master can see.
LanguageData.AnimalsAttackTargetDesc: Direct all mastered animals to attack a specific target.
LanguageData.NoMaster: This animal does not have a master
LanguageData.MasterNotSpawned: This animal's master is not on this map
LanguageData.ConfirmSealHatch: Sealing the ancient stockpile entrance is permanent. Anything or anyone left below will be lost forever.{0}\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.GravshipShieldTip: A short-lived momentum repulsor surface that blocks projectiles. It works against normal shots and mortars. It shuts down instantly if hit by an EMP.
